# Load data and libraries

```{r data, message=FALSE}
library(rtracklayer)
library(EnrichedHeatmap)
library(GenomicFeatures)
library(EnsDb.Mmusculus.v79)
library(TxDb.Mmusculus.UCSC.mm10.ensGene)
library(scater)
library(plyr)
library(reshape2)
library(pheatmap)
library(viridis)
library(ggsci)
library(cowplot)
library(openxlsx)
library(csaw)
library(Gviz)

# Generate feature annotation
tss <- promoters(genes(EnsDb.Mmusculus.v79), 
                 upstream = 0, downstream = 1)
tss <- tss[seqnames(tss) %in% c(as.character(1:19), "X", "Y", "MT"),]
seqlevels(tss) <- c(as.character(1:19), "X", "Y", "MT")
tss.X <- tss[seqnames(tss) == "X"]

# Make TXDB for mus musculus
mmusculusEnsembl <- makeTxDbFromBiomart(dataset="mmusculus_gene_ensembl", 
                                        filter = "")

black <- import("http://mitra.stanford.edu/kundaje/akundaje/release/blacklists/mm10-mouse/mm10.blacklist.bed.gz")

# Read in sce data
sce <- readRDS("/Users/nils/Dropbox (Cambridge University)/SST_spermatocytes/Analysis/data/10X_data/SCE_all_clusters.rds")
sce <- sce[,grepl("B6", colData(sce)$Sample) & 
             !(colData(sce)$AnnotatedClusters %in% c("variable", "Leydig", "Sertoli",
                                          "Endothelial_cells", "Outliers"))]
sce <- normalize(sce)

# Select XChr genes
genenames <- read.table("../Data/Mouse_genes.txt", sep = "\t", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
sce.XChr <- sce[rowData(sce)$ID %in% 
                  genenames[genenames$Chromosome.scaffold.name == "X",1],]
sce.XChr <- normalize(sce.XChr)

# Bulk data
bulk <- readRDS("/Users/nils/Dropbox (Cambridge University)/SST_spermatocytes/Analysis/data/bulk/norm/1st_wave_bulk_norm_reverse-stranded.rds")
# Use genes that are also detected in scRNAseq data
#bulk <- bulk[rownames(bulk) %in% rowData(sce)$ID,]

# Meta info
meta <- as.data.frame(read.xlsx("/Users/nils/Dropbox (Cambridge University)/SST_spermatocytes/Analysis/Metadata.xlsx", sheet = 2))
meta <- meta[!is.na(meta$DO.number),]
rownames(meta) <- meta$DO.number
```

# Overlap DB for H3K4me3 and H3K27ac

```{r}
# Load data
H3K4me3 <- readRDS("/Users/nils/Dropbox (Cambridge University)/SST_spermatocytes/Analysis/CnR/DB/H3K4me3/H3K4me3_1000.rds")
H3K27ac <- readRDS("/Users/nils/Dropbox (Cambridge University)/SST_spermatocytes/Analysis/CnR/DB/H3K27ac/H3K27ac_1000.rds")

# Merge the windows
merged.K27 <- mergeWindows(H3K27ac$windows, tol=100L, max.width=5000L)
tabbest.K27 <- getBestTest(merged.K27$id, H3K27ac$DB)
tabcom.K27 <- combineTests(merged.K27$id, H3K27ac$DB)
colnames(tabcom.K27) <- paste(colnames(tabcom.K27), "_K27", sep = "")
colnames(tabbest.K27) <- paste(colnames(tabbest.K27), "_K27", sep = "")

merged.K4 <- mergeWindows(H3K4me3$windows, tol=100L, max.width=5000L)
tabbest.K4 <- getBestTest(merged.K4$id, H3K4me3$DB)
tabcom.K4 <- combineTests(merged.K4$id, H3K4me3$DB)
colnames(tabcom.K4) <- paste(colnames(tabcom.K4), "_K4", sep = "")
colnames(tabbest.K4) <- paste(colnames(tabbest.K4), "_K4", sep = "")

# Annotate the regions
anno.ranges <- detailRanges(orgdb=EnsDb.Mmusculus.v79,
 txdb=mmusculusEnsembl,name.field = c("SYMBOL"),
 key.field = "GENEID")

# Replce with 
promoters(genes(EnsDb.Mmusculus.v79), 
                 upstream = 0, downstream = 1)

promoters <- anno.ranges[anno.ranges$exon==0L]
promoters.X <- promoters[seqnames(promoters) == "X"]

# K4
olap <- findOverlaps(promoters.X, H3K4me3$windows)
# Look into
getBestOverlaps
tabprom <- combineOverlaps(olap, H3K4me3$DB)
df.K4 <- data.frame(Gene=promoters.X$symbol, tabprom)[!is.na(tabprom$PValue),]

# K27
olap <- findOverlaps(promoters.X, H3K27ac$windows)
tabprom <- combineOverlaps(olap, H3K27ac$DB)
df.K27 <- data.frame(Gene=promoters.X$symbol, tabprom)[!is.na(tabprom$PValue),]
```

# Detect differential regulation

```{r}
# Genes that gain peaks in spermatids
cur_df <- df.K4[df.K4$direction == "up",]
cur_df <- cur_df[order(cur_df$FDR, decreasing = FALSE),]
cur_df

# Visualize their regulation for H3K27ac
df.K27[match(cur_df$Gene, df.K27$Gene),]
```
